title: panicked at 'assertion failed: self.is_collecting_in_band_lifetimes'
body:
main.rs:
```
#![feature(rust_2018_preview)]

#[derive(Debug)]
struct Foo<'_> {
    foo: &'a str,
}


fn main() {
}
```
